action.action-desc: Mr. Luetkemeyer (for himself and Mrs. Carolyn B. Maloney of New York) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To require each agency, in providing notice of a rule making, to include a link to a 100 word plain language summary of the proposed rule.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Providing Accountability Through Transparency Act of 2015.

section.header: Requirement to post a 100 word summary to regulations.gov
